| attempts  | Integer | -   Number of foraging attempts                        |         |
|           |         |                                                        |         |
+-----------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------+---------+
| rsa       | Boolean | -   whether a bird received same species aggression    |         |
+-----------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------+---------+

| isa       | Boolean | -   whether a bird delivered same species aggression   |         |

| ioa       | Boolean | -   whether a bird delivered outer species aggression  |         |

| Successes | Integer | Number of successes for a given observation            |         |
